description: Try our easy to follow White Chocolate Cake Pops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: White Chocolate Cake Pops Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chocolate in a small heatproof bowl over a small saucepan of simmering water (make sure base of bowl doesn't touch the water). Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until melted. Dip eggs, 1 at a time, into chocolate to coat, allowing excess chocolate to drain off, then scatter with 100s & 1000s. Return to trays, then refrigerate for 15 minutes or until set. Serve.
